name: PowerCenter:Delete unnecessary links between transformation
description: In a PowerCenter mapping, data field extracted from sources or generated in the flow itself and never used in targets, should be removed.
output:
This report lists all Mappings and Mapplets with Transformations containing unnecessary links
It provides the following information: 
Mapping full name, Transformations full name
rationale:
Unnecessary links between transformation could impact  visiblity and complexity of the flow in the PowerCenter Designer environment. 
In some cases, PowerCenter optimizer may be mistaken and performance impacted. 
The rule does not take into account the unused outputs of Filter/Router transformation objects that are defined by default by PowerCenter.
This rule does not report the following Source Qualifiers as violation :
Source Qualifier
XML Source Qualifier
MQ Series Source Qualifier
Application Source Qualifier
Application Multi-Group Source Qualifier
remediation:
Check if links are truly unnecessary
Delete links that are not necessary between Transformations
total: Total number of Mappings and Mapplets

technicalCriteria.name: Efficiency - SQL and Data Handling Performance
